title: Stanley on the Congo and commerce MCQ 2

content.question: The commodities listed by Stanley in the second paragraph can best be understood in the context of

choices.label: Europeans’ need for resources to be used in industrial production
raw materials that could be used in African manufacturing centers
crops that could be cultivated on plantations and industrial farms by European settlers
products that would be most suited for export to the Mississippi region of North America

content.answer: Europeans’ need for resources to be used in industrial production

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
